highlights: Worked on the development of a large-scale enterprise application - Workforce Management Software using Java and Spring.
Implemented RESTful APIs and backend modules, ensuring modularity and scalability within the monolith structure.
Led integrations with third-party services, handling both backend logic and security requirements.
Containerized the application using Docker to standardize deployment environments and improve testing.
Worked closely with QA and DevOps teams to improve CI/CD pipelines using GitLab and Jenkins.
Wrote unit and integration tests using JUnit and Cucumber to maintain code quality and reduce regression bugs.
Technologies: Java, Spring, AWS, Docker, GitLab, SQL, Angular
Automated client reporting workflows, saving 6+ hours per week.
Built Power BI dashboards and dynamic Excel templates using SQL-driven insights.
Delivered actionable analytics to support business decisions for an indoor skydiving client.
Worked on the MAC sublayer of the 5G NR protocol stack, focusing on Load-Balancing handovers in the 5G NR Network.
Developed simulation models in Python and analyzed the results using Numpy and Matplotlib.
Successfully demonstrated a 27% performance improvement in load balancing using a novel algorithm.

projects.name: FURIDA Web Application
projects.description: Developed a full-stack web application for an NGO using Java and Spring Boot for the backend and Angular for the frontend. Created REST APIs and integrated PostgreSQL as the database. Containerized the application using Docker and deployed it on AWS EC2. Used AWS RDS to host the PostgreSQL database for improved scalability and maintenance.

awards.title: Postman Student Expert
awards.summary: Awarded by Postman, Inc. for completing training on building and testing API requests using Postman.

awards.title: Samsung SWC (Software Competency)
awards.summary: Cleared the software competency test hosted by Samsung at the end of their internship.
